Authors

{feelpp} is actively developed by Christophe Prud’homme, Vincent Chabannes, Christophe Trophime, Cécile Daversin, Romain Hild, Spephane Veys, and Gabriel Mayaffre.

There are many other contributors.

{hifimagnet} is currently managed by Christophe Trophime, Research Engineer at Laboratoire National des Champs Magnétiques Intenses, France.
